author: Samjktw
title: Video guides
description: With everything Cardano is creating. It would be awesome to have video guides to go with them.

assessments.note:
I believe it is a good idea. I have got lost too, sometimes, such videos would be very appreciated.

Yet I am missing a more detailed timeframe, and the whole proposal requires more work to do.
The proposal is quite vague and, for example, does not explain what the proposed videos will be about. Setting up a node? Submitting a proposal?

This is the beginning of a potentially good proposal, the need for quality step-by-step guides about everything Cardano is indeed a good idea. Yet what subjects wold be covered? How long would the videos be? Would they have a voice-over? All this questions and many more should be covered in a detailed plan.
No plan. No information as to how this would address the challenge.

This is a more suitable idea to 'catalyst value onboarding'. However if you create a mechanism to outreach people and then provide them with this kind of content would be good.
Since it's an idea, need more lapidation to become an actual project.

The proposal does not directly address the challenge of attracting new proposers to Catalyst. A similar proposal with video guides to the Catalysts proposal process would better meet the challenge, if it could demonstrate that such resources do not exist already.
There are already loads of youtuber that cover cardano. There aren't enough details in this proposal that show how this proposal ist gonna bring additional value to the ecosystem
Draft proposal. The proposal doesn't describe a problem to be solved. There is no indication of how the proposal is related to the challenge and there is no plan for measuring the impact.

There are some initiatives about video creating already going on and I believe the this specific proposals is not well suited for this challenge, since it's focused in reaching proposals. Anyway, more information is general is needed.
No experience proof no description was provided.

While it could be good to make instructive videos from a beginner point of view, there is no evidence of previous experience that could inspire trust or a detailed plan that could make up for it. In fact, there is no plan at all.
The proposer admits to not being sufficiently qualified, yet he does not partner with another team member who might be. There is no plan described, no information given.
There is no plan. it is unlikely to be successful.

Since this is just an idea, there is no evidence of feasibility – no explanation in the steps that will be taken, the platform, how it is going to be made, no roadmap, no plan.
However, creating videos it is not a thing out of the world. You just need to mature your idea.

There is no information about the proposer, no roadmap, no clear understandable solution and even not a clear problem. It is hard to see for what the 20k is needed. Maybe have a look at other proposals and try again for next fund! good luck
Draft proposal. There is no plan. I recommend that the proposer detail the proposal, the objective and follow the Catalyst documentation so that we can give appropriate feedback.

There is no information about the proposal capacity of performing the described task, even though it might be easy to do so. There is not budget breakdown and explanation why 20k is needed in this case. More information about the videos and content in there should be included, besides other general information about the project.

No key metrics were provided. 

This proposal requires more work on it.

There is no plan for the implementation, deliverables and success metrics are not defined and  a project timeline is missing. 
The budget has no partitioning and there's no explanation on how it will be used for this project. There's also no mention on how much work will be covered by this budget. 1 video? 10?

"I still feel like it is a good idea!" is not enough of an argument/proposal requesting USD20000. There needs to be a clear detailed project, backed-up by a broken-down budget, a defined expected launch date. Suggest re-submission with all the necessary details included.
No information given on how producing some videos would increase the number of porpoers outside the Cardano community. How would these people even know about the video's. What is the marketing plan?
The proposal is too short to properly assess.
Draft proposal. There is no plan and no details to audit the proposal. Include details, so that we can give appropriate feedback.

There is no information regarding auditability: roadmap, milestones, KPIs, and any other that could help the community to audit and keep track of the developments being done if this proposal is funded. Information is needed in this regard.

solution: Simple step by step video instructions.
experience: Trying to set up a node. My experience is limited. I still feel like it is a good idea!
